verses.verse: וַיִּפְשַׁ֤ע <WH6586> rebelled מוֹאָב֙ <WH4124> Then Moab בְּיִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> against Israel אַחֲרֵ֖י <WH310> after מ֥וֹת <WH4194> the death אַחְאָֽב׃ <WH256> of Ahab

וַיִּפֹּ֨ל <WH5307> fell down אֲחַזְיָ֜ה <WH274> And Ahaziah בְּעַ֣ד <WH1157> through הַשְּׂבָכָ֗ה <WH7639> through a lattice בַּעֲלִיָּת֛וֹ <WH5944> in his upper chamber אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which בְּשֹׁמְר֖וֹן <WH8111> that [was] in Samaria וַיָּ֑חַל <WH2470> and was sick וַיִּשְׁלַ֣ח <WH7971> and he sent מַלְאָכִ֔ים <WH4397> messengers וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> and said אֲלֵהֶם֙ <WH413> to לְכ֣וּ <WH1980> Go דִרְשׁ֗וּ <WH1875> enquire בְּבַ֤עַל זְבוּב֙ <WH1176> of Baalzebub אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> the god עֶקְר֔וֹן <WH6138> of Ekron אִם־ <WH518> whether אֶחְיֶ֖ה <WH2421> whether I shall recover מֵחֳלִ֥י <WH2483> of this disease זֶֽה׃ <WH2088> this ס

וּמַלְאַ֣ךְ <WH4397> But the angel יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> of the LORD דִּבֶּר֙ <WH1696> said אֶל־ <WH413> to אֵלִיָּ֣ה <WH452> to Elijah הַתִּשְׁבִּ֔י <WH8664> the Tishbite ק֣וּם <WH6965> Arise עֲלֵ֔ה <WH5927> go up לִקְרַ֖את <WH7125> to meet מַלְאֲכֵ֣י <WH4397> the messengers מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> of the king שֹׁמְר֑וֹן <WH8111> of Samaria וְדַבֵּ֣ר <WH1696> and say אֲלֵהֶ֔ם <WH413> about הַֽמִבְּלִ֤י <WH1097> corruption אֵין־ <WH369> there אֱלֹהִים֙ <WH430> unto them [Is it] not because [there is] not a God בְּיִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> in Israel אַתֶּם֙ <WH859> you הֹֽלְכִ֔ים <WH1980> [that] ye go לִדְרֹ֕שׁ <WH1875> to enquire בְּבַ֥עַל זְב֖וּב <WH1176> of Baalzebub אֱלֹהֵ֥י <WH430> the god עֶקְרֽוֹן׃ <WH6138> Ekron

וְלָכֵן֙ <WH3651> now therefore כֹּֽה־ <WH3541> thus אָמַ֣ר <WH559> Now therefore thus saith יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> the LORD הַמִּטָּ֞ה <WH4296> from that bed אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> you עָלִ֥יתָ <WH5927> on which thou art gone up שָּׁ֛ם <WH8033> in it לֹֽא־ <WH3808> shall not תֵרֵ֥ד <WH3381> Thou shalt not come down מִמֶּ֖נָּה <WH4480> at כִּ֣י <WH3588> for מ֣וֹת <WH4191> but shalt surely תָּמ֑וּת <WH4191> die וַיֵּ֖לֶךְ <WH1980> departed אֵלִיָּֽה׃ <WH452> And Elijah

וַיָּשׁ֥וּבוּ <WH7725> turned back הַמַּלְאָכִ֖ים <WH4397> And when the messengers אֵלָ֑יו <WH413> to him וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <WH559> unto him he said אֲלֵיהֶ֖ם <WH413> to מַה־ <WH4100> Why זֶּ֥ה <WH2088> unto them Why are ye now שַׁבְתֶּֽם׃ <WH7725> turned back

וַיֹּאמְר֨וּ <WH559> And they said אֵלָ֜יו <WH413> to him אִ֣ישׁ ׀ <WH376> a man עָלָ֣ה <WH5927> up לִקְרָאתֵ֗נוּ <WH7125> to meet וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> us and said אֵלֵינוּ֮ <WH413> to us לְכ֣וּ <WH1980> Go שׁוּבוּ֮ <WH7725> turn again אֶל־ <WH413> to הַמֶּ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> unto the king אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> who שָׁלַ֣ח <WH7971> that sent אֶתְכֶם֒ <WH853> וְדִבַּרְתֶּ֣ם <WH1696> you and say אֵלָ֗יו <WH413> to him כֹּ֚ה <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֣ר <WH559> unto him Thus saith יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> the LORD הַֽמִבְּלִ֤י <WH1097> corruption אֵין־ <WH369> there אֱלֹהִים֙ <WH430> [Is it] not because [there is] not a God בְּיִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> in Israel אַתָּ֣ה <WH859> you שֹׁלֵ֔חַ <WH7971> [that] thou sendest לִדְרֹ֕שׁ <WH1875> to enquire בְּבַ֥עַל זְב֖וּב <WH1176> of Baalzebub אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> the god עֶקְר֑וֹן <WH6138> Ekron לָ֠כֵן <WH3651> from הַמִּטָּ֞ה <WH4296> from that bed אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> who עָלִ֥יתָ <WH5927> on which thou art gone up שָּׁ֛ם <WH8033> in it לֹֽא־ <WH3808> shall not תֵרֵ֥ד <WH3381> come מִמֶּ֖נָּה <WH4480> at כִּֽי־ <WH3588> but מ֥וֹת <WH4191> but shalt surely תָּמֽוּת׃ <WH4191> die

וַיְדַבֵּ֣ר <WH1696> And he said אֲלֵהֶ֔ם <WH413> to מֶ֚ה <WH4100> What מִשְׁפַּ֣ט <WH4941> unto them What manner הָאִ֔ישׁ <WH376> of man אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> who עָלָ֖ה <WH5927> [was he] which came up לִקְרַאתְכֶ֑ם <WH7125> to meet וַיְדַבֵּ֣ר <WH1696> you and told אֲלֵיכֶ֔ם <WH413> about אֶת־ <WH853> הַדְּבָרִ֖ים <WH1697> words הָאֵֽלֶּה׃ <WH428> these

וַיֹּאמְר֣וּ <WH559> And they answered אֵלָ֗יו <WH413> about אִ֚ישׁ <WH376> man בַּ֣עַל <WH1167> archer שֵׂעָ֔ר <WH8181> him [He was] an hairy וְאֵז֥וֹר <WH232> with a girdle ע֖וֹר <WH5785> of leather אָז֣וּר <WH247> and girt בְּמָתְנָ֑יו <WH4975> about his loins וַיֹּאמַ֕ר <WH559> And he said אֵלִיָּ֥ה <WH452> It [is] Elijah הַתִּשְׁבִּ֖י <WH8664> the Tishbite הֽוּא׃ <WH1931> he

וַיִּשְׁלַ֥ח <WH7971> sent אֵלָ֛יו <WH413> to him שַׂר־ <WH8269> unto him a captain חֲמִשִּׁ֖ים <WH2572> of fifty וַחֲמִשָּׁ֑יו <WH2572> with his fifty וַיַּ֣עַל <WH5927> And he went up אֵלָ֗יו <WH413> to וְהִנֵּה֙ <WH2009> behold יֹשֵׁב֙ <WH3427> to him and behold he sat עַל־ <WH5921> on רֹ֣אשׁ <WH7218> on the top הָהָ֔ר <WH2022> of an hill וַיְדַבֵּ֣ר <WH1696> And he spake אֵלָ֔יו <WH413> to him אִ֚ישׁ <WH376> unto him Thou man הָֽאֱלֹהִ֔ים <WH430> of God הַמֶּ֥לֶךְ <WH4428> Then the king דִּבֶּ֖ר <WH1696> hath said רֵֽדָה׃ <WH3381> Come down

וַיַּעֲנֶ֣ה <WH6030> answered אֵלִיָּ֗הוּ <WH452> And Elijah וַיְדַבֵּר֮ <WH1696> and said אֶל־ <WH413> to שַׂ֣ר <WH8269> to the captain הַחֲמִשִּׁים֒ <WH2572> of fifty וְאִם־ <WH518> If אִ֤ישׁ <WH376> If I [be] a man אֱלֹהִים֙ <WH430> of God אָ֔נִי <WH589> I תֵּ֤רֶד <WH3381> come down אֵשׁ֙ <WH784> then let fire מִן־ <WH4480> from הַשָּׁמַ֔יִם <WH8064> from heaven וְתֹאכַ֥ל <WH398> and consume אֹתְךָ֖ <WH853> וְאֶת־ <WH853> חֲמִשֶּׁ֑יךָ <WH2572> thee and thy fifty וַתֵּ֤רֶד <WH3381> And there came down אֵשׁ֙ <WH784> fire מִן־ <WH4480> from הַשָּׁמַ֔יִם <WH8064> from heaven וַתֹּ֥אכַל <WH398> and consumed אֹת֖וֹ <WH853> וְאֶת־ <WH853> חֲמִשָּֽׁיו׃ <WH2572> him and his fifty

וַיָּ֜שָׁב <WH7725> Again וַיִּשְׁלַ֥ח <WH7971> also he sent אֵלָ֛יו <WH413> about שַׂר־ <WH8269> captain חֲמִשִּׁ֥ים <WH2572> of fifty אַחֵ֖ר <WH312> unto him another וַחֲמִשָּׁ֑יו <WH2572> with his fifty וַיַּ֙עַן֙ <WH6030> And he answered וַיְדַבֵּ֣ר <WH1696> and said אֵלָ֔יו <WH413> to him אִ֚ישׁ <WH376> unto him O man הָאֱלֹהִ֔ים <WH430> of God כֹּֽה־ <WH3541> thus אָמַ֥ר <WH559> said הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <WH4428> thus hath the king מְהֵרָ֥ה <WH4120> quickly רֵֽדָה׃ <WH3381> Come down

וַיַּ֣עַן <WH6030> answered אֵלִיָּה֮ <WH452> And Elijah וַיְדַבֵּ֣ר <WH1696> and said אֲלֵיהֶם֒ <WH413> to אִם־ <WH518> If אִ֤ישׁ <WH376> unto them If I [be] a man הָֽאֱלֹהִים֙ <WH430> of God אָ֔נִי <WH589> I תֵּ֤רֶד <WH3381> come down אֵשׁ֙ <WH784> let fire מִן־ <WH4480> from הַשָּׁמַ֔יִם <WH8064> from heaven וְתֹאכַ֥ל <WH398> and consume אֹתְךָ֖ <WH853> וְאֶת־ <WH853> חֲמִשֶּׁ֑יךָ <WH2572> thee and thy fifty וַתֵּ֤רֶד <WH3381> came down אֵשׁ־ <WH784> And the fire אֱלֹהִים֙ <WH430> of God מִן־ <WH4480> from הַשָּׁמַ֔יִם <WH8064> from heaven וַתֹּ֥אכַל <WH398> and consumed אֹת֖וֹ <WH853> וְאֶת־ <WH853> חֲמִשָּֽׁיו׃ <WH2572> him and his fifty

וַיָּ֗שָׁב <WH7725> again וַיִּשְׁלַ֛ח <WH7971> And he sent שַׂר־ <WH8269> a captain חֲמִשִּׁ֥ים <WH2572> fifty שְׁלִשִׁ֖ים <WH7992> of the third וַחֲמִשָּׁ֑יו <WH2572> with his fifty וַיַּ֡עַל <WH5927> went up וַיָּבֹא֩ <WH935> and came שַׂר־ <WH8269> captain הַחֲמִשִּׁ֨ים <WH2572> of fifty הַשְּׁלִישִׁ֜י <WH7992> And the third וַיִּכְרַ֥ע <WH3766> and fell עַל־ <WH5921> on בִּרְכָּ֣יו ׀ <WH1290> on his knees לְנֶ֣גֶד <WH5048> before אֵלִיָּ֗הוּ <WH452> Elijah וַיִּתְחַנֵּ֤ן <WH2603> and besought אֵלָיו֙ <WH413> and וַיְדַבֵּ֣ר <WH1696> him and said אֵלָ֔יו <WH413> to him אִ֚ישׁ <WH376> unto him O man הָֽאֱלֹהִ֔ים <WH430> of God תִּֽיקַר־ <WH3365> be precious נָ֣א <WH4994> please נַפְשִׁ֗י <WH5315> I pray thee let my life וְנֶ֨פֶשׁ <WH5315> and the life עֲבָדֶ֥יךָֽ <WH5650> thy servants אֵ֛לֶּה <WH428> of these חֲמִשִּׁ֖ים <WH2572> of these fifty בְּעֵינֶֽיךָ׃ <WH5869> in thy sight

הִ֠נֵּה <WH2009> Behold יָ֤רְדָה <WH3381> down אֵשׁ֙ <WH784> fire מִן־ <WH4480> from הַשָּׁמַ֔יִם <WH8064> from heaven וַ֠תֹּאכַל <WH398> and burnt up אֶת־ <WH853> שְׁנֵ֞י <WH8147> the two שָׂרֵ֧י <WH8269> captains הַחֲמִשִּׁ֛ים <WH2572> fifties הָרִאשֹׁנִ֖ים <WH7223> of the former וְאֶת־ <WH853> חֲמִשֵּׁיהֶ֑ם <WH2572> with their fifties וְעַתָּ֕ה <WH6258> now תִּיקַ֥ר <WH3365> now be precious נַפְשִׁ֖י <WH5315> therefore let my life בְּעֵינֶֽיךָ׃ <WH5869> in thy sight ס

וַיְדַבֵּ֞ר <WH1696> said מַלְאַ֤ךְ <WH4397> And the angel יְהוָה֙ <WH3069> God אֶל־ <WH413> to אֵ֣לִיָּ֔הוּ <WH452> unto Elijah רֵ֣ד <WH3381> Go down אוֹת֔וֹ <WH854> do אַל־ <WH408> not תִּירָ֖א <WH3372> with him be not afraid מִפָּנָ֑יו <WH6440> of him וַיָּ֛קָם <WH6965> And he arose וַיֵּ֥רֶד <WH3381> and went down אוֹת֖וֹ <WH854> with אֶל־ <WH413> him הַמֶּֽלֶךְ׃ <WH4428> with him unto the king

וַיְדַבֵּ֨ר <WH1696> And he said אֵלָ֜יו <WH413> to him כֹּֽה־ <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֣ר <WH559> unto him Thus saith יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> the LORD יַ֜עַן <WH3282> because אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> you שָׁלַ֣חְתָּ <WH7971> Forasmuch as thou hast sent מַלְאָכִים֮ <WH4397> messengers לִדְרֹשׁ֮ <WH1875> to enquire בְּבַ֣עַל זְבוּב֮ <WH1176> of Baalzebub אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> the god עֶקְרוֹן֒ <WH6138> of Ekron הַֽמִבְּלִ֤י <WH1097> corruption אֵין־ <WH369> there אֱלֹהִים֙ <WH430> [is it] not because [there is] no God בְּיִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> in Israel לִדְרֹ֖שׁ <WH1875> to enquire בִּדְבָר֑וֹ <WH1697> act לָ֠כֵן <WH3651> from הַמִּטָּ֞ה <WH4296> off that bed אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> you עָלִ֥יתָ <WH5927> on which thou art gone up שָּׁ֛ם <WH8033> in it לֹֽא־ <WH3808> shall not תֵרֵ֥ד <WH3381> come מִמֶּ֖נָּה <WH4480> at כִּֽי־ <WH3588> but מ֥וֹת <WH4191> but shalt surely תָּמֽוּת׃ <WH4191> die

וַיָּ֜מָת <WH4191> So he died כִּדְבַ֥ר <WH1697> according to the word יְהוָ֣ה ׀ <WH3068> of the LORD אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which דִּבֶּ֣ר <WH1696> had spoken אֵלִיָּ֗הוּ <WH452> which Elijah וַיִּמְלֹ֤ךְ <WH4427> reigned יְהוֹרָם֙ <WH3088> And Jehoram תַּחְתָּ֔יו <WH8478> his place פ בִּשְׁנַ֣ת <WH8141> year שְׁתַּ֔יִם <WH8147> in his stead in the second לִיהוֹרָ֥ם <WH3088> of Jehoram בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son יְהוֹשָׁפָ֖ט <WH3092> of Jehoshaphat מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> king יְהוּדָ֑ה <WH3063> of Judah כִּ֛י <WH3588> and because לֹֽא־ <WH3808> no הָ֥יָה <WH1961> had ל֖וֹ בֵּֽן׃ <WH1121> because he had no son

וְיֶ֛תֶר <WH3499> Now the rest דִּבְרֵ֥י <WH1697> of the acts אֲחַזְיָ֖הוּ <WH274> of Ahaziah אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which עָשָׂ֑ה <WH6213> which he did הֲלֽוֹא־ <WH3808> not הֵ֣מָּה <WH1992> like כְתוּבִ֗ים <WH3789> [are] they not written עַל־ <WH5921> in סֵ֛פֶר <WH5612> in the book דִּבְרֵ֥י <WH1697> of the acts הַיָּמִ֖ים <WH3117> age לְמַלְכֵ֥י <WH4428> of the kings יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> Israel פ
